channel.title: wsl on Muggle L
channel.description: Recent content in wsl on Muggle L

item.title: Wsl2 Ubuntu20.04 配置 docker
item.description: 1. 配置docker 源 sudo apt update sudo apt install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu focal stable" 2. 安装 sudo apt update sudo apt install docker-ce 3. 配置 启动 sudo service docker start 用户配置 sudo usermod -aG docker ${USER}
